text: you know I can only say I'm not the best
person to answer that question you know
I I can only say what I like and don't
like um and and then I'm a terrible
person to answer the question because
it's so emotionally complicated you know
I wrote my books as books I didn't write
them as screenplays I wrote them as
books because I thought that was the
form the story should take and I wrote
them as I did because I thought that was
exactly the way they should be anything
else would is not what I would have
chosen that having been said you know
when Leah of shriber made a film of
everything is illuminated I really
relinquished all control and opinions
because they weren't going to be helpful
you know the the best um adaptation film
adaptation of a book is not the most
faithful one at all or at least it's not
the one that's faithful to the text it's
probably the one that's faithful to what
the text is referring to um so you know
it's like if you saw a portrait of
somebody who you thought was very
beautiful you wouldn't want to ideally
spend the rest of your life with the
portrait you'd want to spend it with the
person um so I think when leev made that
film he was trying to make a film of
what the book was
about um but as I said it's complicated
because you know it's like hearing your
voice on an answering machine just much
much
stranger I don't give a lot of thought
to the term magical realism I don't I
guess I don't give a lot of thought to
criticism of any kind um good or bad you
know it's not what I do um I think that
creating fiction and um understanding
fiction are two very very different
things and our culture makes the mistake
of thinking they're more similar than
they are there's a great old saying that
a bird is not an
ornithologist uh you know just because
it flies doesn't mean it can explain the
physics of flight doesn't even
necessarily mean it chooses to fly it
just flies because it's a bird
and I think a lot of art is produced
because it's what the the the maker
makes you know there's really no other
explanation for it and um to assume that
the things we produce are the result of
lots of deliberate and conscious choices
I I think that can be a mistake
